description:
In this episode, see high school boys LARP on the way home from school, work at a pizza place, prove their friendship and camaraderie, mistake people for someone else, talk to their principal, relive their childhood, and tell more scary stories.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Danshi Koukousei to Tabidachi no Asa / Danshi Koukousei to Totsumenkyou Shoujo / Danshi Koukousei to Yuujou Power / Danshi Koukousei to Bungaku Shoujo 2 / Danshi Koukousei to Dentou Gyouji / Danshi Koukousei to Shounen Jidai / Danshi Koukousei to Kaidan 2 / Ojou-sama no Nichijou

High School Boys and Setting Out on a Quest / High School Boys and Girls in Convex Mirrors / High School Boys and the Power of Friendship / High School Boys and Book-Loving Girls 2 / High School Boys and School Traditions / High School Boys and Childhood / High School Boys and Ghost Stories 2 / The Daily Life of a Princess
男子高校生と旅立ちの朝 / 男子高校生と凸面鏡少女 / 男子高校生と友情パワー / 男子高校生と文学少女2 / 男子高校生と伝統行事 / 男子高校生と少年時代 / 男子高校生と怪談2 / お嬢様の日常
